review: I like Roku's interface and ease of use better
author: T. King

review: It did work OK on vacation, but the cord is not long enough to even try it at home. Our TV is mounted on the wall so the cord needs to be long to fish through the wall and down to an outlet. Can't even use it at all
author: Lisa Perry

review: Got to replace my 2nd generation Apple TV as You Tube is no longer supported. You Tube works great. Interface not as smooth as Apple TV. Big problem is that many streing apps are not supported by my internet provider Comcast. So I find myself using both my. Apple TV and Firestick.
author: ERIN PODGORNY

review: Works Great  does everything it needs to and Cheaper then most roku boxes ect
author: Vern

review: Works perfectly.  Great interface.  Menus load quickly.  The apps are great.  Have one on every TV I own.
author: Indybrett
